channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Taiwanese Artists Hold Music Festival To Fundraise for Palestine
item.description: Artists from Taiwan's punk and techno scene organized a music festival to fundraise for humanitarian aid for the Gaza Strip. Along with performances, there was a symposium and seve

item.title: U.S. Navy Admiral Aquilino Says Taipei Can Learn From Israel’s Mobilization
item.description: U.S. Navy Admiral John Aquilino says Taiwan can take a cue from Israel’s rapid military mobilization. The admiral says Taiwan has been struggling to recruit sufficient troops.

item.title: Nymphia Wind Crowned Winner of RuPaul's Drag Race, First Taiwanese on Show
item.description: A Taiwanese drag queen has won RuPaul’s Drag Race. President Tsai Ing-wen congratulated Nymphia Wind for being the first drag queen from Taiwan to appear on the popular reality com

item.title: Beach Cleanups in Northeastern Taiwan Held To Help Breeding Seabirds
item.description: People on Taiwan’s northeast coast are picking up trash on the beaches just in time for the seabird breeding season. Seabirds lay their eggs on Yilan’s beaches between May and Augu
